title: Why do i fucking get 1000 ping like wtf?
body: I get 3000 ping when i fucking play and talk to my friends in discord my wifi is fucking far away from my room and i have a wifi adapter in my room plugged with ethernet and all i get is fucking 23984239084908940 ping wtf?

replies.body:
Is the ethernet actually plugged in to your computer? Because no matter how close your Wifi adapter is, WiFi is very unreliable and unstable compared to a wired connection.

Also, I recommend getting a fiber connection. We have Google Fiber with a solid 1000/1000 connection and my ping constantly stays at 16. No lag spikes whatsoever in the year that I've had this internet.

If you have a wired connection and your speed is decent, then it can only be some kind of routing or tampering by your provider. Maybe they're deciding that League of Legends shouldn't have first priority, what with the new appeal to get rid of Net Neutrality and all {{champion:32}}

Also if you don't mind me asking, what Internet service provider are you using?

Ping spikes that high can more often than not be attributed to some kind of packet loss if you don't normally have those issues. I wanna go ahead and test for that really quick using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Let that tool scan some recent network logs from a game that had these crazy spikes, and post a screenshot here for me to look over with you.
